title: The Best TV Shows of 2021
description:
Chris and Andy are joined by Sam Esmail to talk about their favorite TV shows of 2021, including 'It's A Sin,' 'The North Water,' 'Reservation Dogs,' 'Succession,' 'Dave,' and 'The White Lotus.'

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Guest: Sam Esmail
Producer: Kaya McMullen
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
